name: EcovacsGoat
0:
”Alexa, ask GOAT to start mowing.”
”Alexa, ask GOAT to stop mowing.”
”Alexa, ask GOAT to return to dock.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: goat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mowing your lawn has never been easier than it is now! The GOAT allows you to do the mowing work without lifting a finger! 
To get started, make sure you have an ECOVACS account registered in the ECOVACS Home App and your GOAT is connected and online. Then, you just need to enable the ECOVACS GOAT skill by clicking on the “Enable” button. Once you’re all set up, simply give your GOAT a command and it’ll take care of the rest. 
Below are some of the voice commands you can use to control your GOAT. It will start, stop, give updates, dock, get battery level and change the mowing efficiency as you tell it to.
 
START
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to start mowing."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to start weeding."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to start Edge Mowing."
- "Alexa, tell GOAT to mow the edges."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to start mowing with Kitty."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to resume mowing."

STOP
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to stop mowing."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to stop weeding."
- "Alexa, tell GOAT its services are no longer needed."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to stop mowing with Kitty."

PAUSE
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to pause mowing."
- "Alexa, tell GOAT to wait just a moment."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to pause mowing with Kitty."
 
STATUS
- "Alexa, ask GOAT what’s its status?"
- "Alexa, tell GOAT I haven’t heard from it in a while"
- "Alexa, ask GOAT how much longer until it’s done?"
 
DOCK
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to return to dock."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to return to the charging dock."
- "Alexa, tell GOAT it’s time to hit the sack."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to start charging with Kitty."
 
Get battery level
- "Alexa, ask GOAT what is the battery level of Kitty?"
- "Alexa, ask GOAT how much power is remaining?"

Set mowing efficiency
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to adjust mowing efficiency to dynamic."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to to change mowing setting to delicate."
- "Alexa, tell GOAT to switch to delicate mode with Kitty.“

Get current mowing efficiency
- "Alexa, ask GOAT what is the mowing efficiency now."
- "Alexa, ask GOAT to tell me the mowing efficiency of Kitty."

*"Kitty" is the sample custom robot name, which means you can rename your GOAT, and control it with the new name through Alexa. 
For more information about how GOAT connected works with Alexa, go to https://www.ecovacs.com.
